      • kink

        public static double kink(double kinkX,
                          double kinkY,
                          double x)
        The kink function maps x of {0.0,...1.0} to y of {0.0,...1.0}. It is based on two linear parts:
        • 0.0,..kinkX are linearly mapped to 0.0,...kinkY
        • kinkX,...1.0 are linearly mapped to kinkY...1.0
        Parameters:
        kinkX - kink definition X
        kinkY - kink definition Y
        x - argument
        Returns:
        kink(x)

      • transpone

        public static double[][] transpone(double[][] matrix)
        Transpones a double matrix. The matrix must of course be rectangular, even though 2D arrays in Java does not have to.
        Parameters:
        matrix - input matrix
        Returns:
        transponed matrix

      • acos

        public static double acos(double x)
        Quick implementation of arc cos, said to have a max. error of 10-5.
        Parameters:
        x - argument
        Returns:
        arccos(x)
